title: Change Creation Input
description: Input parameters for creating a new change (feature, bugfix, refactor, or epic) in the SDD workflow.

name.description: Directory name for the change (lowercase, hyphens, no spaces)

description.description: Brief description of the change (1-2 sentences)

domain.description: Primary business domain for the change

mode.description: Processing mode: spec-only creates only SPEC.md, full creates both SPEC.md and PLAN.md

workflow_id.description: Workflow ID for change-id assignment (directory format: <id>-<name>)

change_id.description: Pre-assigned change ID from workflow-state (format: <name>-<seq>, e.g. user-auth-1)

source_content.description: Full markdown content to embed in Original Requirements section

decomposition_id.description: UUID linking related changes from a decomposition

prerequisites.description: Prerequisite change names that must be completed first

affected_components.description: Component names from sdd-settings.yaml affected by this change

child_changes.description: Child change definitions for epic type changes

description.description: Brief description of the child change

dependencies.description: Names of other child changes this one depends on

acceptance_criteria.description: Epic-level acceptance criteria (for epic type changes)

cross_cutting_concerns.description: Cross-cutting concerns spanning multiple child changes (for epic type changes)
